title: Gamma Rift
description: I may be a Prince, but there are things that trouble me about my father's royal ruleâ€”the forced abduction, experimentation, and torture of alien creatures. The king has a new prisoner who's a carefully kept secret...There's a young female who belongs to a little-known civilization I have been studying extensively. They are human, belonging to a small, undeveloped planet called Earth. She is pretty in a way I find unusual and compelling. Sometimes I sneak into the adjoining cell and we talk about everything and nothing, even as I find myself yearning to touch her strange, soft skin.Skin that is being subjected to invasive tests and experiments. A body that's scheduled for a live dissection in fifteen days. And a life that will be terminated unless I risk my future and life to help her escape...
author: Kalli Lanford
